description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 2/27/2006

Bridget tells Nick that their marriage is over; there is no way they can fix it.  Nick refuses to believe Bridget, but she continues to tell him that their marriage is not working.  She tells him that he still means a lot to her.  Meanwhile, Brooke will only accept Ridge’s proposal if he agrees to her conditions.  Ridge agrees and the two set a wedding date for the next day.
